details:
Hello, I'm Abdullah!

I'm a talanted UI Software Engineer From Amman, Jordan. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive interface designs.

I'm passionate about the power of colors and shapes in developing a great new design, and JavaScript offers me endless fascinating possibilities. The scope of my world is a large of the Front End Development: RWD, Parallax scrolling, coding layouts, mobile, animations and other HTML / CSS / JS work.

Some of those that I've been lucky to have worked with include such leading global brands as Ooredoo - Qatar, ReserveOut, and many others.

It's important for me not to only be creative but also to pay meticulous attention to details so my clients get the results they want.
